name: Inspirit
description: Inspirit is a virtual experiential learning platform that provides students with immersive simulations, 3D models, and more. Experiential learning is a process in which students “learn by doing,” and stimulates academic inquiry through reflection, engagement, and analysis. Through our virtual reality and 3D technology, students can learn about complex STEM concepts, gain practical skills and techniques for future careers, and directly correlate this knowledge to a “real world” setting without ever leaving the classroom.
features: Facilitate active learning: Inspirit provides students with hands-on experience in real-world situations, allowing them to experiment, explore, and solve problems.
Improve comprehension: VR can improve students’ comprehension of complex STEM concepts by providing visual and interactive representations of abstract ideas.
Increases efficiency and safety: Virtual simulations can save teachers time and effort, eliminating the need for elaborate setups or costly equipment while providing a safe learning space.
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency

enhanced_description: Inspirit is an innovative virtual experiential learning platform leveraging powerful virtual reality (VR) and 3D technology, combined with Stanford research-based instructional practices. Designed for students, it provides immersive simulations and 3D models to facilitate active, hands-on learning in real-world scenarios. The platform aims to improve students' comprehension of complex STEM concepts, accelerate skill development for future careers, and enhance learning efficiency and safety by eliminating the need for elaborate setups or costly equipment. Inspirit is built for easy school implementation, fostering student-centered learning through interactive modules, and offers unparalleled professional development for educators.
